title: ESP-51-UpdateMovementComments Request
description: BRM sends an updated MO comments to ESP

movementRef.description: Unique Id generated for this movement request

ceprReference.description: The CEPR reference of the person

additionalInformation.description: Updated movement order comments entered by the operations user

quoteRef.description: Unique Id generated for this quote request. Its the same as OSE booking requestId

uan.description: Unique Application Number allocated at the point of entry E.g. 1212-0099-0039-4065
